attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe the series has become a British icon comedy show and we should embrace great writers like Derren Litten and the amazing cast. During this financial downturn the comedy is uplifting and has become loved by the nation.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
